title: PC March 24 - Moscow's attack
content:
The horrible attack of Moscow is of a US imperialist matrix/Europe, Ukraine - the authors anyone who are, the war campaign against Russian Mperialism are needed - in progress by the USA and European leaders/NATO - including Italy.

It is all within the acceleration of world interimperial war preparations that builds and seeks pretexts to accelerate it

It wants to justify within the imperialist countries, including Italy, 'anti -terrorism' and pro war measures to impose the decisions and action of governments and parliaments and affect the proletarian, popular, anti -imperialist and revolutionary opposition to war

Communist proletarians/PCM Italia

24 Marzo 2024

----

A Lunce first observations taken from Contropiano

“Ha was ISIS, and that's it. "

The order of stable for the western media started directly from White House.

The Vice President Kamala Harris, with a intervista to Abc news said that " Not There is no proof that Kiev is behind the attack . What we know is that ISIS-K He is responsible for what happened “.

The Cremlin says the exact opposite, but on the basis of some data decidedly more concrete, even if

Of course to be confirmed, etc. After all, he took the four suspects on a Renault while ran from the parts of Bryansk.

Dai Videos published on several canals you see a first stop who answers the questions after have suffered more than a few slaps. In another, one man "Coming from Tajikistan" but entered Turkey, claims to have been paid 5,000 euros, as an advance, to participate to action.

Impossible say, from here (but also give her editorial offices of the mainstream) if the declarations correspond to the True or have been extorted, but - in fact - a little cold blood In examining "the tests" it would be advisable.

AND Instead no. " Has was ISIS, Ukraine has nothing to do with it, it is Putin who wants to use Also this attack to legitimize the war ” .

Certainly there are precedents that push to find the culprit in ISIS Or something that resembles him. Many other times by Islamists There They were attacks against Russian goals; the same ways of the assault are almost a trademark; the nationality of stop - or at least one of them - would lead to the republics Former Soviets of Islamic faith.

There same ISIS has issued a claim with a video of the Four attacks. But it is certainly a "strange" video, outside from tradition and "trademark".

In First place the faces are obscured in order to make them unrecognizable. Which is somewhat useless, as well as without previous (a little glory to the "martyrs" is always a must), since the assault on the Crocus City Hall was led to face discovered, under the gaze of dozens of surveillance cameras e of cell phones lit to the first shots. In short, The four of the ISIS video could very well be "actors" Climbed to the beautiful and better.

An analysis detailed, however, was made by Toni Capuozzo, a former correspondent of war, Mediaset, in any case careful connoisseur of the Islamic world "Hard". And he also points out several inconsistencies: “ Here You have to be cautious, because Europe is on the verge of war that is fighting in Ukraine. But the photograph of the claims of ISIS has something that does not convince me. Steps for The baseball chapels, steps for the "Shuhada", the verse Printed on the flag, too tight to contain it. That that does not come back is the index raised to indicate the uniqueness of God. We saw in a thousand photos, but it is a gesture taken with the right hand. There left in Islam is impure, intended for more humble tasks, So much so that even left -handers are urged to use the right. And here the sacred gesture is made with the left. Which is explained Only with a selfie, taken from the first to the right. A little craftsmanship For a group that is about to perform such an action.

AND Here I ask for help to those who know more than me: the writing on the flag is right. If the photograph is mirroring, the Written, right? ”

Surely Yes, unless there has been a great video assembly work (completely useless, as for the obscured faces).

*****

Return to men in flesh and blood stopped by the parts of Bryansk, Moscow He says they were going to Ukraine, while Kiev swores That they were directed to Belarus (the car had the plaque of that country), thus mentioning a possible "False Flag" operation (practically: " the attack if the Russians were done alone ” ).

There is It should be remembered that this is the Ukrainian refrain for all Anti-Russian attacks. They said the same for the bomb truck on the Kersh bridge, for the Nordstream gas pipeline blew into the Baltic, for the murder of Dugin's daughter, etc. Except Then claim the merit of those operations to themselves.

Cards roads in hand, from Moscow to Bryansk you can go to both countries, given that the city is almost on the border of both. AND If it is certainly true that the Russian-Ucino confinement is strongly supervised due to war, the one with Belarus (allied country of Moscow) it is much less. And so also for the border between Minsk and Kiev.

So It is theoretically possible that the four were going to Ukraine Via Bielorussia, rather than straight for straight. In any case Also Who tried to devise the Zelensky-Boys by resorting to the geolocation specifies the point where the four were stopped had to surrender to the evidence: that road there just - and only - in the Ukraine…

Hypothesis, Certain. But luckily the four are alive and are talking to the investigators. Which are Russian, of course. Who others would have the right to to do it?

In reality on the attack of Moscow those who have something serious To be explained are the US, and in general, the Euro-Atlantic.

As He even recalls the ineffable Italian Foreign Minister, Antonio Tajani, " l ‘ attack of Moscow was in the air, so much so that we had warned ours compatriots on the Farnesina website not to go to Russia e However, if on the spot, not to participate in events already on 8 March “ . “ Era in the air…". A foreign minister of a NATO country not It sniffs the wind to obtain information, but the reports can be read who put the intelligence services on the table (the Italian ones they depend closely on the CIA). So He had also been informed by the United States just before The famous note was issued by the embassy in Moscow who warns its citizens in the Russian capital that " extremists they have imminent plans to target large gatherings in Moscow, including i concerts , And US citizens should be advised to avoid Large gatherings in the next 48 hours ” .

The information It is too precise - "suicide", we wrote - to be The result of a "hearsay". At least presupposes some "throats deep ”very well inserted in the group that is preparing the action. Like Massimo, that group is to your orders (or one of yours more faithful allies).

There nationality of the "dead meat" sent to kill and remain killed only to justify an "Islamist" claim, that moves suspicions from those who are at war at this moment with Fly. In fact, there is no lack of fundamentalist groups that have good reasons to make yourself available to attack the Kremlin
